verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: that the U.S. was withdrawing from the multilateral nuclear accord with Iran , Russia , China and European allies] .
President Trump announced that the U.S. [V: was] withdrawing from the multilateral nuclear accord with Iran , Russia , China and European allies .
President Trump announced that [ARG0: the U.S.] was [V: withdrawing] [ARG2: from the multilateral nuclear accord with Iran , Russia , China and European allies] .
